summary: Iteration 9 testing completed - All 11 requested features verified working: Admin login, Dashboard KPI cards, Dashboard charts, Dashboard filters, User Management page access control, User list with roles/status, Create/Edit/Delete users, Proficiency Rates table, and Inline editing.

issues: Recharts console warnings about chart width/height being -1 on initial render - cosmetic issue, charts render correctly after layout settles

passed_tests: Admin Login - POST /api/auth/login with admin@test.com/admin123 returns JWT token and admin role
Dashboard KPI Cards - Total Projects (21), Total Revenue ($2.6M), Approved (6), In Review (0)
Dashboard Charts - Projects by Status pie chart, Revenue Trend line chart, Top Customers bar chart
Dashboard Filters - Date From, Date To inputs, Customer dropdown with Apply/Clear buttons
User Management Access - Only visible in sidebar for admin users
User Management List - Shows 6 users with Name, Email, Role badges (User/Admin), Status (Active), Action buttons
Add User Dialog - Full Name, Email, Password, Role dropdown, Create User button
Edit User Dialog - Full Name, Email, Role dropdown, Active Status switch, Save Changes button
Delete User - Delete button functional for each user row
Proficiency Rates Table - 12 rates with Technology, Skill Name, Base Location, Proficiency Level, Avg Monthly Salary
Proficiency Rates Inline Edit - Click edit shows input field, save (checkmark), cancel (X) buttons
Backend API /api/users - Admin gets user list (200), non-auth gets 401
Backend API /api/users POST - Creates new user with role
Backend API /api/users PUT - Updates user role/status
Backend API /api/users DELETE - Deletes user and verifies removal
Backend API /api/proficiency-rates PUT - Inline salary update persists correctly
critical_code_review_comments: RBAC working correctly - User Management link only shows for admin role users in Layout.js line 33-35
User Management API endpoints properly check admin role before allowing access
JWT authentication with proper token validation and 24-hour expiration
Inline editing for Proficiency Rates uses proper state management with editingRate and editSalary
Dashboard filters work with Select component using 'all' as default value instead of empty string (fixed Select issue)

success_rate.backend: 93% (14/15 tests passed - 1 skip due to test data)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 9 RBAC and user management features working. Key features: 1) Login as admin@test.com/admin123 to access User Management; 2) Dashboard has working filters (Date From/To, Customer dropdown); 3) User Management shows users with roles and action buttons (Edit/Reset Password/Delete); 4) Proficiency Rates has inline editing - click pencil icon, edit salary in input field, save with checkmark or cancel with X.

dashboard_kpis.evidence: Total Projects, Total Revenue, Approved, In Review cards visible with data

dashboard_charts.evidence: Projects by Status pie, Revenue Trend line, Top Customers bar charts render

dashboard_filters.evidence: Date From, Date To, Customer dropdown with Apply/Clear buttons functional

user_management_access.evidence: nav-user-management link visible only when user.role === 'admin'

user_list_with_roles.evidence: Table shows Name, Email, Role (User/Admin badges), Status, Actions columns

create_user.evidence: Add User dialog with Full Name, Email, Password, Role, Create User button

edit_user.evidence: Edit dialog with Full Name, Email, Role dropdown, Active Status switch

delete_user.evidence: Delete button triggers confirmation and removes user from list

proficiency_rates_table.evidence: Table shows 12 rates with Technology, Skill, Location, Level, Salary

proficiency_rates_inline_edit.evidence: Click edit shows inline input with $8500, save/cancel buttons work

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/auth/me: Returns current user with role - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/dashboard/analytics: Returns KPIs and chart data - PASS
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/customers: Returns customer list for filter dropdown - PASS
